General.Name: Jiangxi Huangshanghuang Group Food Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Huangshanghuang Group Food Co., Ltd., develops, produces, and sells braised meat products in China. The company offers a range of products, including soy products and cold dishes, as well as rice products, such as zongzi, green group, mochi, eight-treasure rice, and instant porridge. It also provides vegetables and aquatic products, as well as other livestock and poultry products. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China.
General.Address: No. 66, Xiaolan Middle Avenue, Nanchang, China, 330052
